Hi secret_myth,
I've never really posted any requests as I'm more than grateful for the movies you provide. But, I would like to request you this one time. 
As your ripping techniques have vastly improved, compared to your earlier rips IMHO, could you please re-rip & upload some of the lengthy movies? To give a few examples: Titanic, King Kong 2005, The Shawshank Redemption, Batman Begins and The Dark Knight. These movies were ripped in 1.4 GB size each, but because of their lengths, the output quality suffers, in some cases.
Thanks a lot for your efforts to provide us with high quality movies.

When you encode, you're supposed to use numbers that are divisible by 16 in order to obtain best video results. So you have ripped to 1280 x 688 (not 690). Really, these are fundamentals of video encoding. I just don't get why you keep transgressing these basics, man. I'll get the REFiNED. Thanks.

Received DMCA Infringement notice.
Please be aware that under no circumstances is your private information protected.
Whether you are using a blocker like PeerGuardian or proxy software your information can and will be tracked and can and will be used against you.

It's up to you to decide if the risk is worth it or not, my service is in jeopardy of being shut off because i tried to download this (including many other piratebay torrents downloaded in the past)

My current stance is to go only with totally private trackers cuz the large trackers such as piratebay or demonoid are most likely to be those that are attacked by the greedy media producers.

Aside from this, "secret_myth," your movie rips are absolutely amazing, the quality is above all others.  Keep up the great work, if you upload to any private tracker i would love to know about it.
